Describe#

Class#

Eventstream#

Eventstream.describe(session_col='session_id', raw_events_only=False)[source]#

Display general eventstream information. If session_col is presented in eventstream, also output session statistics.

Parameters:
session_colstr, default ‘session_id’

Specify name of the session column. If the column is presented in the eventstream, session statistics will be added to the output.

raw_events_onlybool, default False

If True - statistics will be shown only for raw events. If False - for all events presented in your data.

Returns:
pd.DataFrame

A dataframe containing descriptive statistics on the eventstream.

Notes

  • All float values are rounded to 2.

  • All datetime values are rounded to seconds.
